programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: 脚踏食地
programme.desc: 延续着第一集的脚步，这次我们来到了吉打，希望能够揭开更多关于吉打的神秘面纱。随着炸鸡的香味，文杰来到了这间Nasi Lemak Royale。据说吉打人都比较喜欢吃湿一点的食物，而这里的Nasi Lemak精髓就是它的酱汁。接着我们来到吉打州最大型的馬來式雜飯檔，这里的食物种类将近100种。有着许多马来传统的沙拉Ulam，也搭配着好几种来自不同地区的sambal 任君选择。而来到这，我们才知道原来友族同胞真的会用香蕉的茎部来煮成咖喱，这也是文杰第一次尝到这个Gulai Batang Pisang。最后文杰.
